attributes.additional_details:
We call on the UK Government to carry out a referendum in Wales with a view to reuniting the Welsh and English National Health services.

Since the NHS was divided, healthcare in Wales, run by the Welsh Government, has continually under performed in terms of waiting times, funding for life-saving cancer drugs and investigating high death rates.

The principle of a truly National Health Service has always enjoyed wide spread support. We should reunite the NHS.
